summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank from February 25 to February 28, 2015. It details deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and the ending balance, highlighting significant transactions including a large transfer of funds.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $300,000 was made from Jeffrey Epstein's account to Wachovia Bank.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $54,955 was recorded.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas, USVI 00802
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's account had a beginning balance of $42,959,295 as of February 25, 2015.
A significant transfer of $300,000 occurred on February 26, 2015.
The document outlines service charges totaling $50.00 for the statement period.
The ending balance of Epstein's account as of February 28, 2015, was $5,295,045.00.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for assistance regarding the account.
